description: In need of last-minute dinner inspiration? Bring delicious Japanese flavours to the table with this healthier take on crispy chicken katsu
name: Healthier Chicken Katsu Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 5 ml extra virgin olive oil cooking spray

recipeInstructions.text: Divide rice among bowls, and top with cabbage, edamame, avocado and sliced chicken. Sprinkle with onion and sesame seeds. Serve with sauce and lemon wedges.
